Title: Relates to eligibility requirements for victims of sex offenses to receive awards from the office of victim services
Summary: Relates to eligibility requirements for victims of sex offenses to receive awards from the office of victim services; removes time limitations on when reports of a sex offense must be made; removes requirement that a victim of a sex offense participate in the criminal justice system; establishes that a written or verbal statement made to certain persons shall be deemed to be a report to a criminal justice agency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to eligibility requirements for victims of sex offenses to receive awards from the office of victim services
